title: annex add -J5 :  "rename" and "getFileStatus": "does not exist"
body:
continuation to #5742 found while testing #5735 with , while cmd:annex: 8.20201007-g903b2f1 and -J5 
```
======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.tests.test_auto.test_proxying_lzma_LZMAFile(<function test_proxying_lzma_LZMAFile.<locals>.generate_dat at 0x7f2d4c8ee670>, <function test_proxying_lzma_LZMAFile.<locals>.verify_dat at 0x7f2d4c841dc0>)

    for r in self._call_annex_records(

    raise e
  File "/tmp/dl-miniconda-1rlt6bqy/lib/python3.8/site-packages/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 1074, in _call_annex_records
    out = self._call_annex(
  File "/tmp/dl-miniconda-1rlt6bqy/lib/python3.8/site-packages/datalad/support/annexrepo.py", line 970, in _call_annex
    return runner.run_on_filelist_chunks(

    res = self.run(
  File "/tmp/dl-miniconda-1rlt6bqy/lib/python3.8/site-packages/datalad/cmd.py", line 408, in run
    raise CommandError(
datalad.support.exceptions.CommandError: CommandError: 'git -c diff.ignoreSubmodules=none annex add --json --json-error-messages -c annex.dotfiles=true -c annex.retry=3 -J5 -- test d1/d2/test2' failed with exitcode 1 under /tmp/nfsmount/datalad_temp__test_proxying_opennme5xlj5 [err: 'git-annex: add: 1 failed'] [errors from JSON records: ["['git-annex: .git/annex/othertmp/fbf_82b_SHA256E-s60--d64328f12ce97f2d1802fda0a42d8d073489f40a23cd3afa8bce12ee0f8b3fe5.log: rename: does not exist (No such file or directory)']"]] [info keys: stdout_json]
```
